text.en: About what are they asking one another
About the great news
That over which they are in disagreement
No! They are going to know
Then, no! They are going to know
Have We not made the earth a resting place
And the mountains as stakes
And We created you in pairs
And made your sleep [a means for] rest
And made the night as clothing
And made the day for livelihood
And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]
And made [therein] a burning lamp
And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water
That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
And gardens of entwined growth
Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time

text.ar: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا
text.en: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes
And the heaven is opened and will become gateways
And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage
Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait
For the transgressors, a place of return
In which they will remain for ages [unending]

text.ar: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا
text.en: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink
Except scalding water and [foul] purulence
An appropriate recompense
Indeed, they were not expecting an account
And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial
But all things We have enumerated in writing
So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment
Indeed, for the righteous is attainment
Gardens and grapevines
And full-breasted [companions] of equal age
And a full cup

text.ar: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّـٰبٗا
text.en: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood
[As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account

text.ar: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا
text.en: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech

text.ar: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفّٗاۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابٗا
text.en: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct

text.ar: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
text.en: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return

text.ar: إِنَّآ أَنذَرۡنَٰكُمۡ عَذَابٗا قَرِيبٗا يَوۡمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡكَافِرُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَٰبَۢا
text.en: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust
